title: Love Triangle UK
overview: Love Triangle sees six singles choose between just two handpicked partners (suitors). Based on a connection made by texting only, the single and their chosen match meet on a blind date before taking the extraordinary step of moving in together, in the hope of fast-tracking their relationship.What the singles don't know, is that the pursuit of a â€˜happy ever after' comes with an explosive twist, when the rejected match arrives looking for love.
